How to use:

 1. Create a Telegram bot using @BotFather
 2. Get your bot token from BotFather
 3. Start a chat with your bot
 4. Get your chat ID (use @userinfobot)
 5. Enter bot token and chat ID above
 6. Grant SMS permissions
 7. Enable the forwarding service

 All incoming SMS will be forwarded to your Telegram.
